casebody.data:
CITY OF BURLINGTON
v.
PUBLISHERS. No. 518PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Robert M. Ward, Burlington, Jay H. Ferguson, Durham, for City of Burlington. Hugh Stevens, Raleigh, for Boney Publishers. Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Raleigh, for N.C. League of Municipalities.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of February 2005 by N.C. League of Municipalities for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
